Header.title: Tradable
Header.paragraph: The best platform to check gold tradability

About.paragraph: Tradable is a platform where every importer/exporter can keep a track of all the events starting from gold production, import, export, verification. Only the verified imported gold will be a legal tender in country. This will almost stop smuggling of gold and save government's money.
Why2: No legal tender to unverified Gold
Catching smuggler and banning license of faulty companies
